LeftCurly.description:
Description

Checks for the placement of left curly braces
('{') for code blocks.
LeftCurly.option:
ignoreEnums, Allow to ignore enums when left curly brace policy is EOL., boolean, true
option, Specify the policy on placement of a left curly brace ('{')., LeftCurlyOption, eol
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens
